name: DONUT
full_name: Anomaly detection algorithm based on Variational Auto-Encoder
paper: Unsupervised Anomaly Detection via Variational Auto-Encoder for Seasonal KPIs in Web Applications. WWW
description: Semi-supervised anomaly detection algorithm based on Variational Auto-Encoders (VAE). More precisely, DONUT incorporate three techniques: Modified ELBO and Missing Data Injection for training, and MCMC Imputation for detection.
